releases.title: v0.9.0 - Vertical Modules, SDOH Screening & Dynamic Voice Tools
releases.content:
## What's New in v0.9.0

### Omni-Channel Platform
Connect with customers across 12 messaging channels from a single interface. Each channel has a unified adapter with setup wizard, OAuth flows, health monitoring, and webhook routing.

**Channels:** WhatsApp Business, Telegram, Slack, Microsoft Teams, WeChat, Facebook Messenger, Instagram Direct, LINE, Viber, Discord, SMS (Twilio), Email (Resend)

### Unified Agent Builder
Agent Builder, Voice Agents, and Voice AI consolidated into one builder with 7 configuration tabs â€” Identity, Goals, Script, Skills Marketplace, Execution, Optimization (A/B testing), and Runtime Adaptations. Agents can now be linked to campaigns and conversations, and each agent has a dedicated chat endpoint for testing.

### Voice Infrastructure
- **Dual-stack telephony:** SIP (Janus Gateway on Cloudflare Containers, B3Networks bridge) and Telnyx with audio recording to R2
- **xAI Grok** as default LLM with intelligent model routing
- **Minimax TTS** with per-agent and per-tenant voice configuration
- **Dynamic tool dispatch:** voice agents now use their own tool definitions instead of hardcoded lead capture tools
- **Call Logs page** with unified SIP + Telnyx query and recording playback

### Vertical Industry Modules
Module framework supporting industry-specific archetypes, tool definitions, disposition codes, and prompts. Ships with 4 verticals: healthcare, real estate, debt collection, and retail.

- **Healthcare SDOH Screening:** archetype following Healthy People 2030 framework with 11 intervention tools, 6 disposition codes, and HIPAA-compliant prompt with crisis routing (911/988)
- **Disposition auto-tagging:** contacts automatically tagged based on call outcomes using industry-specific templates

### CLI Control Plane
Full-featured CLI (`kira`) with 276 subcommands â€” SSO login, agent management, campaigns, contacts, conversations, workflows, documents, MCP registry, voice providers, channels, and database sync/export/import. Includes shell completion and JSON/table/minimal output formatters.

### Workflows & Automation
30 pre-built workflow templates across 6 industries (healthcare, retail, telecoms, transportation, travel, finance). Workflow canvas with improved layout, AI Decision panel, execution history, and phone call node support.

### Security & Compliance
- **Compliance framework:** LGPD, HIPAA, CFM, PDPA, GDPR declarations per tenant
- **Adaptive security guardrails** (Phase 1 + 2) with fail-closed patterns
- **Entra ID OIDC** and multi-provider auth abstraction via WorkOS AuthKit
- **Hardened API:** session token hashing, WebSocket ticket auth, PII masking, parameterized queries, CORS hardening, webhook signature verification

### Platform
- MCP server expanded from 18 to 64 tools for full CLI coverage
- Marketing deck generation system
- Data tables (TanStack Table) for Campaigns, Workflows, and Conversations
- Seed data management UI with demo data presets
- Campaign performance analytics and contact statistics API
- Dark mode improvements across all views
- CI consistency checks on pushes to main

## Full Changelog
https://github.com/keyreply/kira-cloudflare/compare/v0.8.0...v0.9.0

releases.title: v0.8.0 - Call Script Optimizer
releases.content:
## Call Script Optimizer

Major release introducing an AI-powered system for continuously optimizing sales call scripts through evolutionary algorithms, A/B testing, and multi-armed bandits.

### Highlights

- **Script Genome** - Structured script representation with modular components (opening, hook, discovery, CTA, objections, end)
- **Variant Generation** - AI-powered micro-mutations with change tracking and lineage
- **Guardrails Pipeline** - Deterministic checks + LLM judge + simulation regression
- **A/B Testing** - Fixed-split experiments with holdout groups and statistical analysis
- **Bandit Algorithms** - Thompson sampling for continuous optimization
- **Canary Deployment** - Safe rollout with auto-pause on guardrail breaches
- **Event Attribution** - Call outcome tracking with provisional/finalized conversions
- **Real-time Routing** - Sub-200ms variant selection at call start

### New Services

| Service | Purpose |
|---------|---------|
| `EvolutionService` | AI-powered variant generation |
| `DeterministicGuardrailsService` | Token limits, forbidden phrases |
| `LLMJudgeService` | AI compliance scoring |
| `SimulationService` | Persona regression testing |
| `ValidationPipeline` | Complete validation flow |
| `ScriptRoutingService` | Thompson sampling bandits |
| `ScriptExperimentService` | A/B testing engine |
| `ScriptEventService` | Call outcome tracking |
| `DeploymentService` | Canary rollout management |
| `ScriptCompilerService` | Genome â†’ prompt pack |

### New API Endpoints

- `GET/POST /v1/scripts/genomes` - Genome management
- `GET /v1/scripts/genomes/:id/variants` - Variant listing
- `POST /v1/scripts/variants/:id/deploy` - Canary deployment
- `POST /v1/scripts/variants/:id/promote` - Champion promotion
- `GET/POST /v1/scripts/experiments` - Experiment management
- `POST /v1/scripts/events/call-outcome` - Event ingestion
- `GET /v1/scripts/campaigns/:id/funnel` - Funnel metrics
- `POST /v1/scripts/route` - Real-time routing

### Frontend Components

- `GenomeEditor` - Module-based script editing
- `ScriptSetupWizard` - Multi-step campaign setup
- `FunnelDashboard` - Funnel visualization
- `VariantLeaderboard` - Performance comparison

### Documentation

- [Feature Documentation](docs/features/call-script-optimizer.md)
- [PRD](docs/prd/call-script-optimizer.md)

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/keyreply/kira-cloudflare/compare/v0.7.0...v0.8.0

releases.title: v0.5.0 - MCP Server Store & Agent Integration
releases.content:
# MCP Server Store & Agent Integration

This release introduces full MCP (Model Context Protocol) support, enabling agents to connect to external services through a standardized protocol. Inspired by [Salesforce's MCP announcement](https://developer.salesforce.com/blogs/2025/06/introducing-mcp-support-across-salesforce).

## âœ¨ New Features

### MCP Server Store
- **Marketplace UI**: Browse and install MCP servers from a curated store
- **Category Navigation**: Organized by CRM, DevOps, Integration, Communication, Productivity, Storage, AI, Analytics
- **One-Click Install**: Install servers with credential configuration
- **Health Monitoring**: Real-time health status for all installed servers

### Pre-Seeded MCP Servers
- **Salesforce DX** - Salesforce CLI and development tools
- **Salesforce Heroku** - Heroku platform management
- **Salesforce MuleSoft** - API and integration platform
- **Slack** - Team communication and messaging
- **GitHub** - Repository and code management
- **Linear** - Issue tracking and project management
- **Notion** - Workspace and documentation
- **Google Drive** - Cloud storage and documents

### Agent MCP Integration
- **Per-Agent Bindings**: Connect specific MCP servers to individual agents
- **Tool Allowlist/Denylist**: Fine-grained control over which tools each agent can access
- **Priority Ordering**: Control tool resolution order across multiple servers
- **Schema Discovery**: Automatic tool schema fetching and caching

### Backend Infrastructure
- **MCPClientService**: HTTP and SSE transport protocol support
- **MCPRegistryService**: Store management and installation handling
- **Health Checking**: Periodic health monitoring with status tracking
- **Invocation Logging**: Full audit trail for MCP tool calls
- **Credential Encryption**: Secure storage of API keys and tokens

## ğŸ”§ Technical Details

### New API Endpoints
```
# MCP Server Store
GET    /mcp/registry                    - List servers in store
GET    /mcp/registry/categories         - List categories
GET    /mcp/registry/:serverId          - Server details

# Tenant Installations
GET    /mcp/installations               - List installed servers
POST   /mcp/installations               - Install server
PUT    /mcp/installations/:id           - Update config
DELETE /mcp/installations/:id           - Uninstall
POST   /mcp/installations/:id/health    - Health check
POST   /mcp/installations/:id/refresh   - Refresh schema

# Agent MCP Bindings (via AgentDO)
GET    /agents/:agentId/mcp-servers     - List bindings
POST   /agents/:agentId/mcp-servers     - Add binding
PUT    /agents/:agentId/mcp-servers/:id - Update binding
DELETE /agents/:agentId/mcp-servers/:id - Remove binding
```

### Database Schema
- `mcp_server_registry` - Global server catalog
- `mcp_server_categories` - Category organization
- `mcp_server_installations` - Tenant-specific installations
- `mcp_tool_invocations` - Audit logging
- `agent_mcp_servers` (AgentDO) - Per-agent bindings

### Authentication Types Supported
- None (public servers)
- API Key
- Bearer Token
- OAuth 2.0 (infrastructure ready, flows in Phase 5)

releases.title: v0.4.0 - Testing, OpenAPI & Security
releases.content:
## Highlights

This release adds comprehensive test coverage, API schema validation, and critical security fixes.

## ğŸ§ª Testing Infrastructure

- Added **Vitest** with React Testing Library
- **56 new test files** covering frontend components and API routes
- Test utilities: setup, factories, and API mocks
- Coverage thresholds enforced at 60%

```bash
bun run test           # Run all tests
bun run test:watch     # Watch mode
bun run test:coverage  # Coverage report
bun run test:ui        # Interactive UI
```

## ğŸ”§ API Improvements

- Added **OpenAPI/Zod schemas** to all API routes for request/response validation
- Enhanced route handlers with proper typing and error responses
- Expanded skills, tenants, customers, and telephony endpoints

## ğŸ”’ Security Fixes

### 1. Authorization Bypass in Workflow Endpoints
- Added `tenant_id` validation to GET, toggle, execute, and test endpoints
- **Prevents cross-tenant workflow access, modification, and execution**
- Files: `workers/api/src/routes/workflows.ts`

### 2. CIDR IP Whitelist Bypass in A2A Auth  
- Replaced broken string prefix check with proper bit-mask CIDR validation
- **Prevents IP whitelist bypass attacks** (e.g., `192.168.10.x` no longer bypasses `192.168.1.0/24`)
- Files: `workers/api/src/middleware/a2aAuth.ts`

## ğŸ¨ UI Updates

- Improved Agent Builder, Skills Marketplace, and Workflow Editor
- Enhanced Login page and channel configuration components
- Updated ChatArea, Contacts, and Testing components

## ğŸš€ CI/CD

- Fixed GitHub Actions workflow to use **Bun** instead of npm

---

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/keyreply/kira-cloudflare/compare/v0.3.0...v0.4.0
